title: Regulation No 614/67/EEC of the Commission of 26 September 1967 amending Regulation No 202/67/EEC on fixing the additional amount for imports of pigmeat products from third countries
header:
REGULATION No 614/67/EEC OF THE COMMISSION  of 26 September 1967  amending Regulation No 202/67/EEC on fixing the additional amount for imports of pigmeat products from third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following shall be substituted for Article 1 (1) (b) of Regulation No 202/67/EEC:  "
(b) for meat of domestic swine in carcases or half-carcases mentioned in the first sentence of Article 1 of Regulation No 134/67/EEC, as amended by Regulation No 173/67/EEC : the price determined in accordance with the provisions of Article 2, for meat of domestic swine in carcases or half-carcases with the heads, feet and flare fat, of a quality corresponding to the standard quality determined in accordance with the provisions of Article 4 (4) of Regulation No 121/67/EEC ; the prices obtained by applying Article 2 shall be increased by 17.65 % in the case of meat of slaughtered sows.
"
The provisions of Article 1 (1) (d) of Regulation No 202/67/EEC are hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 September 1967.
For the Commission
The President
Jean REY (1) OJ No 117, 19.6.1967, p. 2283/67. (2) OJ No 134, 30.6.1967, p. 2837/67.
